column4: im trying to install gimpshop, can you help me a bit, it says that: /lib/tls/i686/cmov/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.3.4' not found (required by gimp)
If you're really brave, you can try upgrading to Breezy.  The glibc in Hoary is too old for what you want to do.
what do you mean by broken package :/
But you need to upgrade the whole system.  Just glibc on its own will cause you problems.
